bug.author: jlewi
bug.summary: kfctl doesn't correctly check if extra deployment manager configs exist
bug.description:
The if condition is wrong
kubeflow/bootstrap/pkg/kfapp/gcp/gcp.go
Line 579 in 47a28b7
if _, networkStatErr := os.Stat(path.Join(gcp.Spec.AppDir, GCP_CONFIG, NETWORK_FILE)); !os.IsNotExist(networkStatErr) {
<denchmark-code>if _, networkStatErr := os.Stat(path.Join(gcp.Spec.AppDir, GCP_CONFIG, NETWORK_FILE)); !os.IsNotExist(networkStatErr) ... updateDeployment </denchmark-code>
UpdateDeployment would only be called if the file is an error other than DoesNot exist. That is not what we want. We should instead be checking that the error is nil. /cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/gabrielwen>@gabrielwen</denchmark-link>
/cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ashahba>@ashahba</denchmark-link>
